channel.title: Glen Powell on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Glen Powell on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Scream Queens’ Co-Creator Muses About Reviving Horror Series, Talks Glen Powell’s Now “Movie Star” Fame
item.description: The Fox series ended in 2016 after two seasons, to which Ian Brennan says: “We had really good ideas for where it could go next,” including a Friday the 13th-like setting.

item.title: ‘Scream Queens’ Co-Creator Muses About Reviving Horror Series, Talks Glen Powell’s Now “Movie Star” Fame
item.description: The Fox series ended in 2016 after two seasons, to which Ian Brennan says: “We had really good ideas for where it could go next,” including a Friday the 13th-like setting.

item.title: Glen Powell and Eli Manning: Meet Hollywood’s Most Unlikely ‘Powers’ Couple
item.description: What happens when a white-hot movie star and a champion quarterback team up for a risky football comedy with heart? Chad Powers happens. (Just don’t call it Hulu’s ‘Ted Lasso’!)
